_source.text: 1-Sonic Mega Collection 2-Sonic Gems Collection 3-Sonic Unleashed 4-Sonic Adventure 2 5-Sonic Adventure 6-Sonic Advance (Saga) 7-Sonic Heroes 8-Sonic and the black knigth (is not so so so bad) 9-Sonic Rush 10-Shadow the hedgehog (is not the best, but is way better than Sonic NextGen)
